item.title: 深度解析：星巴克供应链困境内幕——人工智能故障、供应商分散及三明治短缺
item.description: 过去五年间，四位星巴克首席执行官都将销售额下滑归咎于公司难以确保美国数千家门店稳定供应咖啡馆必需品——包括牛奶、糕点和杯盖。【原文：Four Starbucks CEOs over five years have blamed lost sales on its struggle to keep its thousands of U.S. stores reliably stocked with coffeehouse essentials like milk, pastries, and cup lids.】

item.title: 加拿大IPO市场蓄势复苏，彰显经济信心
item.description: 加拿大沉寂已久的首次公开募股市场有望在2026年重焕生机，这标志着经济信心的复苏，或将扭转企业多年撤离该国主要证券交易所的局面，并验证政府亲商政策的成效。【原文：Canada's dormant market for initial public offerings is poised for revival in 2026, signaling renewed economic confidence that could help reverse a years-long corporate exodus from the country's main ​stock exchange and validate the government's pro-business agenda.】

item.title: 联合健康集团预测2026年利润略高于预期
item.description: 联合健康集团周二预测2026年调整后利润将略高于分析师预期，这表明首席执行官斯蒂芬·赫姆斯利实施的医疗成本控制措施开始初见成效。【原文：UnitedHealth on Tuesday forecast 2026 adjusted profit slightly above analysts' estimates, in a sign that medical cost-control measures under CEO Stephen Hemsley were beginning to reap results.】

item.title: 标普、纳斯达克期货上涨，企业财报大周来临；医保费率冲击保险公司
item.description: 追踪标普500指数和纳斯达克指数的期货周二小幅走高，投资者正为当天晚些时候即将公布的从汽车制造商到航空公司的众多财报调整仓位。【原文：Futures tracking S&P 500 and the Nasdaq ticked higher on Tuesday, as investors positioned themselves for a slew of earnings from automakers to airlines later in the day.】

item.title: 美国医保优势计划2027年支付方案未达预期，健康保险公司股价应声下跌
item.description: 周二盘前交易中，健康保险公司股价大幅下挫，此前特朗普政府提出的明年联邦医疗保险优势计划（Medicare Advantage）涨幅低于预期。【原文：Shares of health insurers tumbled in premarket trading on Tuesday after the Trump administration proposed a smaller-than-expected increase to next year's ​Medicare Advantage plans.】

item.title: 印度旅游胜地果阿邦考虑禁止儿童使用社交媒体
item.description: 印度顶级旅游胜地果阿邦正考虑效仿澳大利亚对儿童实施社交媒体禁令，随着该国逾十亿网民对青少年使用社交媒体危害心理健康的担忧日益加剧，此举引发关注。【原文：India's top tourist state of Goa is considering an Australia-like social media ban for children, as concerns grow over the risks of such use to their mental health in a nation with more than a billion internet users.】

item.title: 欧盟启动程序协助谷歌遵守科技法规
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二在一份声明中表示，已启动程序协助谷歌母公司Alphabet遵守欧盟《数字市场法案》（DMA）。【原文：The European Commission has started proceedings to assist Alphabet's Google in complying with the EU's Digital Markets Act (DMA), it said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日元信心危机笼罩日本首相高市早苗的选举豪赌
item.description: 东京与华盛顿协调买入日元的阴影支撑着日本货币，但历史表明实际干预的影响可能有限，尤其因为首相高市早苗正以扩大刺激措施作为其提前选举的竞选纲领。【原文：The spectre of coordinated yen buying by Tokyo and Washington has propped up Japan's currency, but history suggests the impact of an actual intervention could be limited, especially because Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi is basing her snap election campaign on expanded stimulus measures.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，大众汽车因电池起火风险将召回逾4.4万辆美国车辆
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周二表示，德国汽车制造商大众汽车将在美国分两次召回44,551辆ID.4电动汽车，召回原因与潜在的电池相关火灾风险有关。【原文：German automaker Volkswagen will recall 44,551 ID.4 electric vehicles in the U.S. in two separate recalls tied to potential battery-related fire risks, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度与欧盟达成里程碑式贸易协议，大幅削减汽车、烈酒和纺织品关税
item.description: 该协议预计将使欧盟对印度的出口额在2032年前翻一番，其价值占比达96.6%的贸易商品将取消或降低关税。【原文：The deal is expected to double EU exports to India by 2032 by eliminating or reducing tariffs in 96.6% of traded goods by value.】

item.title: 中国安踏体育斥资18亿美元收购彪马29%股权，排除全盘收购可能
item.description: 中国最大运动品牌安踏体育周二宣布，将以15亿欧元（约合18亿美元）从皮诺家族手中收购彪马29.06%的股权，成为这家德国运动服饰制造商的最大股东。【原文：China's biggest sportswear brand Anta Sports Products said on ​Tuesday it would buy a 29.06% stake in Puma from the Pinault family for 1.5 billion euros ($1.8 billion), making it the biggest ‌shareholder in the German sportswear maker.】

item.title: 日本商工会议所会长称若日元急剧波动则干预外汇市场合理
item.description: 日本最大经济团体经团联会长筒井义信周二表示，若干预旨在遏制日元快速波动，则具有正当性。【原文：Currency intervention would be justified if it is aimed at arresting rapid moves in the yen, Yoshinobu Tsutsui, head of Japan's biggest business lobby Keidanren, said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 越南汽车制造商将与中国比亚迪合作建立价值1.3亿美元的电动汽车电池工厂
item.description: 越南汽车制造商金龙汽车周二宣布，将与中国比亚迪公司合作，在越南中部投资1.3亿美元建设工厂，生产商用电动汽车电池。【原文：Vietnam auto manufacturer Kim Long Motor said on Tuesday that it was partnering with China's BYD to develop a $130 million plant to produce batteries for commercial electric vehicles in central Vietnam.】

item.title: 马丁靴销量下滑，折扣减少令消费者却步
item.description: 英国靴业巨头Dr Martens周二公布季度销售额下滑，并预测全年营收增长基本持平。由于欧洲和亚太地区消费者对恢复全价销售持抵触态度，该公司股价应声下跌近13%。【原文：British bootmaker Dr Martens posted a decline in quarterly sales and forecast broadly flat annual revenue growth on Tuesday as shoppers across Europe and Asia-Pacific baulked at a return to full prices, knocking its shares nearly 13% down.】

item.title: 安踏体育增持股份，彪马股价飙升15%
item.description: 周二法兰克福早盘交易中，彪马股价上涨15%，此前中国安踏体育宣布将收购这家德国运动服饰制造商29.06%的股权。【原文：Shares in Puma rose 15% in early Frankfurt trading on Tuesday after China's Anta Sports Products said it would buy a 29.06% stake in the German sportswear maker.】

item.title: 英国政界人士呼吁对奈飞收购华纳兄弟案展开竞争审查，《金融时报》报道
item.description: 据《金融时报》周二报道，英国十余名政界人士及前政策制定者已呼吁该国竞争监管机构对奈飞公司以830亿美元收购华纳兄弟探索公司的交易展开全面审查。【原文：More than a dozen UK politicians and former policymakers have called on the country's competition watchdog to launch a full review of Netflix's $83 billion bid for Warner Bros Discovery , the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿达尼集团与巴西航空工业公司签署协议，将在印度生产飞机
item.description: 印度阿达尼集团与巴西航空工业公司周二宣布，双方将在印度合资成立一家区域运输飞机企业，此举标志着阿达尼正式进军商用航空制造领域。【原文：India's Adani Group and Brazil's Embraer SA will partner to set up a regional transport aircraft venture in India, the companies said on Tuesday, heralding Adani's entry into commercial aviation manufacturing.】

item.title: 《金融时报》报道称以色列将寻求与美国达成新的安全协议
item.description: 据《金融时报》周二报道，以色列正准备与特朗普政府就一项新的十年期安全协议展开谈判，寻求延长美国军事支持。与此同时，以色列领导人已表示正为未来减少美国现金援助做准备。【原文：Israel is preparing for talks with the Trump administration on a new 10-year security deal, seeking to extend U.S. military support even as Israeli leaders signal they are planning for a future with reduced American cash grants, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家：日美拟斥资5500亿美元推进合成钻石产业
item.description: 知情人士透露，在美国建设人造钻石工厂的计划是日本5500亿美元投资方案中的重点项目。随着两国盟友致力于扩大这种对芯片和高精度制造至关重要的材料的生产规模，该计划正加速推进。【原文：A plan to build a synthetic diamond plant in the United States is a prime prospect in Japan's $550-billion investment package, as the allies push to expand production of a material vital to chip and high-precision manufacturing, sources said.】

item.title: 独家：2025年德国企业对华投资激增，因担忧美中贸易战
item.description: 路透社汇编数据显示，2025年德国企业在华投资额创下四年新高，凸显出美国总统特朗普发起的贸易战正促使产业界和各国政府加强与其他地区的商业联系。【原文：German companies' investments in China hit a four-year high in 2025, according to data compiled for Reuters, underscoring how U.S. President Donald Trump's trade war is pushing industries and governments to boost ​business ties elsewhere.】

item.title: 欧洲面临进一步落后风险，银行集团发出警告
item.description: 欧洲银行业联合会警告称，除非欧盟彻底改革那些削弱银行放贷能力的监管政策，否则欧洲经济将面临进一步落后于其他地区的风险。【原文：Europe's economy risks falling further behind other regions unless the European Union overhauls regulation that is undermining banks' ability to lend, the European Banking Federation has warned.】

item.title: ASML借势英伟达，凭借激光技术与巨型芯片"打印机"实现腾飞
item.description: 随着人工智能企业争相抢购推动AI热潮所需的英伟达芯片，荷兰企业ASML已在供应链中开辟出关键领域：制造用于生产这些芯片的激光设备。【原文：As artificial intelligence firms jostle for the Nvidia chips needed to power the AI boom, Dutch firm ASML has carved out a key niche in the supply chain: building the laser-using machines needed to print them.】

item.title: 印度石油公司寻求委内瑞拉原油以提升炼油厂重质原油加工能力
item.description: 印度国有企业印度斯坦石油公司董事长维卡斯·考沙尔周二表示，该公司正首次寻求采购委内瑞拉原油，因这家炼油商计划在4月开始的新财年增加重质原油加工量。【原文：India's state-run Hindustan Petroleum Corp Ltd is seeking Venezuelan crude for the first time as the refiner plans to increase heavy oil processing in the new fiscal year starting April, Chairman Vikas Kaushal said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度与欧盟敲定里程碑式贸易协议，莫迪总理表示
item.description: 印度与欧盟已敲定一项具有里程碑意义的贸易协议，该协议将覆盖全球四分之一的经济总量。此举旨在为双方寻求对冲与美国关系不稳定的风险。【原文：India and the European Union have finalised a landmark trade deal that will represent a quarter of the world's economy, as the two sides seek to hedge against fickle ties with the U.S.】

item.title: 早盘竞价：关税何在？投资者逢低买入
item.description: 欧洲及全球市场今日展望——由邱思妤为您解读【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 非洲国家目前向中国汇出的资金已超过其获得的新贷款总额
item.description: 根据ONE Data发布的分析，过去十年间，中国作为发展中国家主要融资方的角色已发生转变：对较贫困国家的新增贷款大幅下降，而债务偿还额持续攀升。【原文：China's role as a leading financier to developing nations has shifted over the ‌past decade, with new loans to poorer countries falling sharply while debt repayments continue to rise, according to analysis released by ONE Data.】

item.title: 欧盟12月纯电动车销量首次超越汽油车
item.description: 数据显示，12月欧盟纯电动车销量首次超越汽油车，而政策制定者却提议放宽排放法规。【原文：Fully electric car sales in December overtook petrol for the first time in the European Union, even as policymakers proposed to ​loosen emissions regulations, data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: LVMH投资者仍对奢侈品疲软和中国增长持谨慎态度
item.description: 投资者期待路威酩轩集团周二公布的年度业绩能进一步显示这家奢侈品巨头在经历长期低迷后正在复苏，但他们也希望首席执行官伯纳德·阿诺特采取更多行动，以赢回因大幅提价而疏远的消费者。【原文：Investors are hopeful LVMH's annual results on Tuesday will show further signs the luxury giant is recovering after a lengthy slowdown, but they also want more action from CEO Bernard Arnault to win back shoppers alienated by hefty price hikes.】

item.title: 解读：特朗普总统为何再次威胁提高对韩国的关税？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示，他将把从韩国进口的汽车和其他商品的关税提高到25%，理由是首尔未能立法批准去年达成的贸易协议，该协议将美国对这些商品的关税上限设定为15%。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said he was hiking tariffs on autos and other goods imported from South Korea to 25%, citing Seoul's failure to legislate a trade deal agreed last year that capped U.S. levies on the items at 15%.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪与埃克森美孚将深化混合动力技术合作
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪周二在一份声明中表示，该公司将与美国石油巨头埃克森美孚深化在混合动力技术领域的合作。【原文：China's BYD and U.S. oil major Exxon Mobil will deepen their partnership in hybrid technology, the Chinese electric vehicle maker said in a statement on Tuesday.】
